official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands withdrawn by the Bureau of Reclamation for townsite purposes to the Huntley Project Irrigation District, Ballantine, Montana.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey specified lands to the Huntley Irrigation District, Montana.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands withdrawn by the Bureau of Reclamation for townsite purposes to the Huntley Project Irrigation District, Ballantine, Montana.
